Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to the amount of taxes paid by a cooperative
Summary: Provides that in a city having a population of one million or more the amount of taxes to be paid by a cooperative shall not be less than five per centum of the annual shelter rent or carrying charges of such rehabilitation project.
LawCode: Amd ยง125, Priv Hous Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law, in relation to the amount of taxes paid by a cooperative
